golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Aplastic anemia with associated chronic kidney disease
2. Alport syndrome with associated chronic kidney disease and various extrarenal manifestations
3. Hemolytic uremic syndrome secondary to an underlying medical condition
4. Hemolytic uremic syndrome associated with autoimmune disease
5. Hemolytic uremic syndrome associated with an inherited renal disorder
6. Hemolytic uremic syndrome associated with a viral infection, such as Shiga toxin-producing Escherichia coli
7. Hemolytic uremic syndrome with associated kidney failure and respiratory distress
8. Hemolytic uremic syndrome with associated neurological symptoms, such as seizures
9. Hemolytic uremic syndrome with associated renal involvement and anemia
10. Hemolytic uremic syndrome with associated extrarenal symptoms, such as jaundice and abdominal pain
